title: Viking Professional Series 30 inch Double Electric French Door Oven VDOF730SS Overview
description:
Buy Viking Professional Series 30 inch Built-In Electric French-Door Oven VDOF730SS - http://www.abt.com/product/77581/Viking-VDOF730SS.html
Shop All Built-In Electric Ovens - http://www.abt.com/category/471/Built-In-Electric-Ovens.html

Features:
• Large Capacity Oven
Cook for everyone you know and still have leftovers with the largest capacity oven in the industry.
• Open Both Doors with One Hand 
Easily open either French-Door with just one hand and the companion door conveniently opens simultaneously.
• CoolLit™ LED Lights 
Heavy-duty metal knobs are accented with exclusive CoolLit™ LED Lights when unit is turned on.
• Vari-Speed Dual Flow™ Convection 
Maximize airflow and fluffiness with Vari-Speed Dual Flow™ Convection System. Two-speed convection system capable of turning the fan in both directions. This combined with the largest convection fan blade in the industry provides maximum airflow.
• Concealed Bake Element 
Get more control and less mess with the 10-pass concealed bake element. This dual concealed bake element provides finer temperature control and makes oven clean up easy.
• TruConvec™ Convection Cooking
TruConvec™ Convection Cooking refers to the exclusive air circulation system employed by Viking convection ovens. Uses only convection element in rear of oven and fan-forced air - no direct heat from top or bottom.
• TruGlide™ Full Extension Racks
Six porcelain-coated rack positions with three oven racks including two TruGlide™ Full Extension Racks in the upper oven and one in the lower oven ensures heavy pans are easily moved
• Rapid Ready™ Preheat System 
Wait less and cook more with the Rapid Ready™ Preheat System. Quick preheat means less time for the user to wait for the oven to be ready to cook in.
• Gourmet-Glo™ Infrared Broiler
Lock in all the savory juices of even the thickest porterhouse with the intense heat of the restaurant-quality Gourmet-Glo™ Infrared Broiler. Intense heat from broiler sears meats and fish locking in juices.
